entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
